artist: Author: Aaron Cometbus; Translator: Stéphane; Publisher: Aaron Cometbus , Berkeley
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky

title: En Dépit De Tout: Une Slection D'Histoires de Cometbus
